title: Did Russian Official Recommend No Booze for 42 Days After COVID Vaccination?
subtitle: The "Sputnik V" vaccine at issue here differs from the vaccines nearing approval in the United States.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Russian health official recommended that people being vaccinated with Russia's Sputnik V Covid-19 vaccine abstain from drinking for two weeks before the first shot and 42 days after it.
